archie.methodology: About the simulator We estimate odds by randomly simulating the remainder of the season thousands of times and counting how often each team makes the playoffs, gets the No. 1 seed, the No. 1 overall draft pick and so on. If you don’t specify an outcome for a particular game, we use estimates from a statistical forecast that incorporates a host of data, including team records, roster changes, weather, game location and more advanced measures like expected points added (EPA) and defense-adjusted value over average (DVOA).
archie.credits: By: Ryan Best, David Haye, Elliot Jordan, Junghye Kim, Austin Mock, Thomas Oide, Laura Pelton, Yuriko Schumacher, and Oliver Viehweger
archie.note: Adapted from The New York Times's NFL Playoff Simulator.
archie.index_header_sub: Each team’s path to the postseason
archie.index_intro_p1:
Welcome to The Athletic’s 2025 NFL Playoff Simulator, where you'll find everything you need to know about all the ways your favorite team's season could end, from a No. 1 playoff seed to the first overall pick in the 2026 Draft.
Above, you’ll find our best guess for the playoff picture at the end of the season, along with which teams would make the postseason if the season ended today. Below, you’ll find much more detailed estimates for all 32 NFL teams.
archie.draft_intro: If you’re already ready to look ahead to next year — you know who you are — this is the place to do it. Here you’ll find our estimates for the order of the 2026 NFL draft, updated with each game result. And remember you can use the team simulator pages to target the No. 1 pick, too.
archie.sim_p1: sim_p1: With {{ N }} games remaining, the {{ team_name }} have a {{ percent_chance_tk }} to make the playoffs. This interactive tool is designed to help you explore which games matter most for the {{ team_name_short_tk }} playoff chances. As you pick winners of games, the colors on some games will change, reflecting their relative importance.
archie.sim_p2: The tables below represent all NFL games remaining. While the {{ team_name }}’ games are typically the most important, outcomes from other games can affect the {{ team_name }}’ chances indirectly. Pick winners and explore which games matter most.
archie.details_p1: Below, our estimates for the {{ team_name }}’s chances at all playoff outcomes since the beginning of the season. These figures are updated after every NFL game, and occasionally when there is a player injury or other roster news.
archie.area_hed: How the {{ team_name }}’ chances have changed
archie.details_p2: Here you’ll find our estimates for all remaining combinations of records the {{ team_name }} may end the season with.
